description: A playful twist on why kids cross playgrounds.
title: Slide Quest
n_1: Mike and Sandy are at the playground, eyeing the slides.
n_2: They compete to reach the slide first, running across.
n_3: Both laugh and play, enjoying the slide and swings.
n_4: In the end, they understand the joy of playing together.
c1_4: The other slide was worth it!
